ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2021-04-13"),
NOT(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName ='HB_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName ='H_B_Received' )),
ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Received"), ISBLANK(Text(Follow_form__c)), OR(CONTAINS(Coverages__c , "Excess"), CONTAINS(Coverages__c , "Umbrella") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Follow Form is required when Quote status is Received
